data.title: Soap Opera Digest
data.meta_description: With Pine Valley citizens pointing the finger at one another over Richie Novak’s murder, what better time to look back at ALL MY CHILDREN’s murder mysteries? Here are the highlights of some of the best. 1992: Will Cortlandt — hit with a crowbar. Suspects: Brian Bodine, Adam Chandler, An Li Chen, Opal Cortlandt, Palmer Cortlandt,…
data.text:
With Pine Valley citizens pointing the finger at one another over Richie Novak’s murder, what better time to look back at ALL MY CHILDREN’s murder mysteries? Here are the highlights of some of the best.

1992: Will Cortlandt — hit with a crowbar.

Suspects: Brian Bodine, Adam Chandler, An Li Chen, Opal Cortlandt, Palmer Cortlandt, Trevor Dillon, Erica Kane, Craig Lawson, Dimitri Marick, Gloria Marsh, Arlene Vaughan, Hayley Vaughan

Killer: Janet Green

November 2001: Frankie Stone — shot.

Suspects: Erica Kane, Bianca Montgomery

Killer: A man hired by Frankie’s aunt, Vanessa Cortlandt

August 2003: Michael Cambias — shot.

Suspects: David Hayward, Kendall Hart, Erica Kane, Adam Chandler, Palmer Cortlandt

Killer: Bianca Montgomery, who murdered Cambias in self-defense when he tried to rape her for the second time

March 2005: Edmund Grey — hit in the head with a shovel.

Suspects: Zach Slater, Braden Lavery

Killer: Jonathan Lavery

July 2006: Greg Madden — buried alive.

Suspects: Zach Slater, Tad Martin, JR Chandler, Dixie Cooney, Erica Kane, Jamie Martin

Killer: Tad Martin buried Madden alive in an attempt to coerce him into confessing Kate’s whereabouts. An earthquake caused his suffocation.
